hero.title: Dive into the Heart of the Paris 2024 Olympic Games
hero.subtitle: Book your tickets now to experience the unique thrill of the Olympics.

history.title: A Bit of History
history.text: The modern Olympic Games were revived in 1896 in Athens, with the aim of promoting peace and solidarity among nations. Since then, this global event has brought together thousands of athletes from over 200 countries every four years to push the limits of whatâ€™s possible. Paris 2024 marks the return of the Games to France after 100 years, promising unforgettable competitions at legendary venues.

events.title: Must-See Events
events.intro: Experience the intensity and emotion of these iconic competitions at the upcoming Olympic Games.

item1.title: Opening Ceremony
item1.description: A grand spectacle of music, dance, and pageantry to officially launch the Games.

item2.title: Athletics
item2.description: From sprint races to jumping events, discover one of the most popular disciplines.

item3.title: Swimming
item3.description: Dive into the aquatic world, from freestyle races to acrobatic diving.

item4.title: Judo
item4.description: A Japanese martial art where strength and technique clash on the tatami.
